summary: The Ground and Orbital Launched Defeat of Emergent Nuclear Destruction and Other Missile Engagements Act of 2025 (GOLDEN DOME Act) aims to significantly improve and modernize U.S. missile defense capabilities. It establishes a 'Golden Dome' holistic missile defense strategy, accelerates the development of various defense technologies (including non-kinetic and space-based systems), and authorizes substantial appropriations for related programs. The bill focuses on all-domain awareness, command and control, and rapid deployment of advanced technologies while calling for enhanced testing and integration.
